column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This is a great ramen bar! It's not NYC
column3: but it is still very tasty. They have so many options
column4: and something definitely for everyone. Their buns are a perfectly moist
column6: even if you order take out. I would recommend to call in your order if you want to pick k up
column7: as it comes out WAY cheaper. The staff is always friendly and they have saved me by bringing me towels and such as I got stuck in torrential Houston rain as I was walking there. I am definitely a fan
